# Lin_et_al_2020  

Lin J, Kroll CN, Nowak DJ (2020) Ecosystem Service-Based Sensitivity Analyses of i-Tree Eco. Arborioculture & Urban Forestry 46:21 <https://www.fs.usda.gov/treesearch/pubs/62066> 


---

Keywords: Urban forests, [[iTree]], [[carbon storage]]	

Models of urban trees can improve planning - a common model is iTree Eco. iTree makes assumptions that simplify urban landscapes. Performed a sensitivity analysis of iTree with data from NYC. Identifies with explanatory variables should be focused on to reduce model inaccuracy. Methods for model validation.
